casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Curtis Ray ANDERSON, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157235
COA: 341790 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 24, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
